questionTitle: If I  _______ the same problem you had as a child, I might not have succeeded in life as well as you have.
I _______ you sooner had someone told me you were in the hospital.
_______ more help,I could call my neighbor.
_______ then what I know today,I would have saved myself a lot of time and trouble over the years.
do you think there would be less conflict in the world if all people _______ the same language?
If you can give me one good reason for your acting like this, _______ this incident again.
I didn't know you were asleep.Otherwise,I _______ so much noise when I came in.
Unless you  _______ all of my questions,I can't do anything to help you.
Had you told me that this was going to happen, I _______ it.
If Jake _______ to go on the trip, would you have gone?
